name: [DEMO] Dance of Love
description:
”DANCE OF LOVE” is a mobile first chat / visual novel game in which you take on the role of Alvin Rein, a student who moves to ”Republic City” and falls in love with the fellow student — Tea.

But unexpected events bring her away from him…

Will he come to terms with his future past or will he sink into a never-ending hole?

A bittersweet slice-of-life game which is inspired by true events.

---

This is a demo! Text, images, voices and overall design are subject to change and may not reflect final release.
